\documentclass{standalone}
%\pagenumbering{gobble}


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%
% schematic of two level diagram
%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%


\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{arrows,snakes}


\begin{document}

\tikzset{
	level/.style={thick},
	trans/.style={thick, dashed, ->, shorten >=2pt,shorten <=2pt,>=stealth},
	photon/.style={thick, ->, snake=snake, line after snake=1mm}
	}


\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1.0, font=\sffamily]

	% Draw the energy levels
	\draw[level] (7.5,0) -- (0,0) node[left] {1};
	\draw[level] (7.5,3) -- (0,3) node[left] {2};

	% Draw the transitions
	\draw[trans] (1.5,0) -- (1.5,3);
	\node[align=center] at (1.3,3.2) {\small{Absorption}};
	\draw[trans] (3.0,3) -- (3.0,0);
	\node[align=center] at (3.2,3.2) {\small{Emission}};
	\draw[trans] (5.2,3) -- (5.2,0);
	\node[align=center] at (5.4,3.2) {\small{Stimulated}};

	% Draw the photons
	\draw[photon] (0,2.1) -- (1.45,2.1);
	\node[align=left] at (0.3,2.4) {\small{$B_{12}J_{\rm line}$}};
	\draw[photon] (3.0,1.8) -- (4.5,1.8) node[above] {\small{$A_{21}$}};
	\draw[photon] (4.45,1.0) -- (5.95,1.0);
	\draw[photon] (5.2,0.7) -- (6.7,0.7) node[below] {\small{$B_{21}J_{\rm line}$}};

\end{tikzpicture}

\end{document}
